XXvtrksopu:411: 16) kāryaviruddhakāryopalabdhir yathā nehāpratibaddhasāmarthyāni śītakāraṇāni santi dhūmād iti /
XXvtrksopu:412: pratiṣedhyānāṃ śītakāraṇānāṃ kāryaṃ śītaṃ tasya viruddho 'gnis tasya kāryaṃ dhūmas tasya cehopalabdhiḥ //
XXvtrksopu:416: tathā svabhāvaviruddhopalabdhyādāv apy anupalabdhirūpatā vidyata eva /
XXvtrksopu:417: sahābhāvākṣepikā yasyopalabdhiḥ sā tasyānupalabdhir ity anupalabdhilakṣaṇayogāt /
XXvtrksopu:418: tathā hi yeyaṃ vahner upalabdhiḥ sā śītābhāvam ākṣipati /
XXvtrksopu:419: 11. bhavatv anupalabdhiḥ sā dṛśyatā tu katham /
XXvtrksopu:422: tathā hi yadi śītasparśo dṛśyo bhavet tadā tasyopalabdhiṃ niṣedhyābhāvavyāpto vahnir viruṇaddhy eva /
XXvtrksopu:426: yasyāṃ tv anupalabdhau tadaiva tam eva pratipattāraṃ prati dṛśyatvaṃ pratiṣedhyasya siddhaṃ dṛśyānupalabdhir eva tasyāḥ svalakṣaṇam iti sākṣāt svabhāvānupalabdhiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:428: yady api saṃpratitanī dṛśyānupalabdhir nāsti virodhādikāle tv āsīd saiva bhāvapratipattinibandhanam iti /
XXvtrksopu:430: saṃpratitanyaś ca dṛśyānupalabdher abhāvāt tatsvabhāvānupalabdher anyāsām anupalabdhīnāṃ bheda iti /
XXvtrksopu:431: 12. yad api kaiścit svabhāvaviruddhopalabdhyādīnām anumitānumānatayā dṛśyānupalabdhirūpatocyate /
XXvtrksopu:432: dūrād vahne rūpaviśeṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā uṣṇasparśaviśeṣas taddeśavyāpako 'numīyate tasmāc ca śītasparśābhāvapratītiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:433: āhatya tu dṛśyānupalabdher anudayād dṛśyānupalabdher bhedena nirdeśaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:434: ata eva cānumitānumānam etat kevalam atyantābhyāsāj jhaṭiti tathābhūtapratītyudaye saty ekam anumānam ucyate /
XXvtrksopu:435: vastutas tv anekam anumānam etat evam anyatrāpi vyāpakaviruddhopalambhādāv ūhyam iti dvayam apy etan na manasi toṣam ādadhāti //
XXvtrksopu:437: yo hetor ātmanaḥ sattām apekṣya vidyamāno na hetusattāvyatiriktaṃ kiṃcid dhetum apekṣate /
XXvtrksopu:439: anena ca viśeṣaṇe nāntyāt kāraṇāt kāryaṃ yad utpadyate tasya saṃgrahaḥ (Ts 294) kṛtaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:440: tad api hi tasya svabhāva eva /
XXvtrksopu:442: anyārtham api kṛtam anyārthaṃ bhavatīti nyāyāt paravipratipattir api nirākṛtā /
XXvtrksopu:443: pare hi paścātkālabhāvinam api kṛtakatvādidharmaṃ svabhāvam icchantīti /
XXvtrksopu:445: kāryaṃ yāvadbhiḥ svabhāvair avinābhāvi kāraṇe hetur iti prakṛtam /
XXvtrksopu:446: kāraṇe sādhye yāvadbhiḥ svabhāvair avinābhāvi tair eva hetuḥ /
XXvtrksopu:450: sādhyaś ca vidhiḥ pratiṣedho vā anyonyalakṣaṇavyavacchedalakṣaṇatvād anayoḥ /
XXvtrksopu:453: arthāntare tu gamye kāryam iti dvāv etau vidhisādhanau /
XXvtrksopu:456: yasmāt svabhāvapratibandhe sati sādhanārthaḥ sādhyārthaṃ gamayet /
XXvtrksopu:458: nanu svabhāvapratibandham antareṇāpi candrodayāt kumudavikāsapratipattiḥ samudravṛddhiś ca /
XXvtrksopu:461: tat katham ucyate svabhāvapratibandhe saty artho 'rthaṃ gamayed iti /
XXvtrksopu:465: yo yatra svabhāvena na pratibaddhaḥsa tarn apratibaddhaviṣayam avaśyam eva na na vyabhicaratīti nāsti tayor avyabhicāraniyamaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:467: tathā hi hetudharmasyaiva tādṛśo 'trānumitir yatrāmbhojabodhādaya ekakālā jātāḥ /
XXvtrksopu:469: vāyuviśeṣa eva ca yaḥ kṛttikādyudayakāraṇaṃsa eva hi saṃtatyā rohiṇyādyudayakāraṇaṃ /
XXvtrksopu:482: svabhāvapratibandhe hi saty artho 'rthaṃ gamayed iti /
XXvtrksopu:491: pūrvam uktaṃ yat trirūpaṃ liṅgaṃ tasya yat prakāśakaṃ vacanaṃ tat parārtham anumānaṃ kāraṇe kāryopacārāt /
XXvtrksopu:500: visadṛśo dharmo yasya sa vidharmā tasya bhāvo vaidharmyam /
XXvtrksopu:503: yasya ca vaidharmyam abhidheyaṃ tad vaidharmyavat /
XXvtrksopu:504: nanu ca sādharmyavati sādhanavākye vyatireko nāsti /
XXvtrksopu:505: vaidharmyavati cānvayas tat kathaṃ trirūpaliṅgākhyānaṃ parārtham anumānaṃ syāt /
XXvtrksopu:509: sādharmyābhidheyena yukte prayoge samarthyād vyatirekasya pratītis tasmāt trirūpaliṅgākhyānam /
XXvtrksopu:510: tasmin vyatireke buddhyāvasīyamāne 'sati sādhyena hetor anvayasya buddhyāvasitasyābhāvāt //
XXvtrksopu:514: tatheti yathānvayavākye tathārthād eva vaidharmyeṇa prayoge 'nvayasyānabhidhīyamānasyāpi gatiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:515: asati tasminn anvaye buddhigṛhīte sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvasyāsiddher anavasāyāt /
XXvtrksopu:516: tasmād ekenāpi vākyenānvayamukhena vyatirekamukhena vā prayuktena sapakṣāsapakṣayor liṅgasya sadasattvakhyāpanaṃ kṛtaṃ bḥavatīti nāvaśyaṃ vākyadvayaprayogaḥ //
XXvtrksopu:517: 4. tatrānupalabdheḥ sādharmyavān prayogaḥ yad yatropalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ san nopalabhyate sa tatrāsadvyavahāraviṣayaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:519: nopalabhyate ca kvacitpradeśaviśeṣa upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpto ghaṭa iti /
XXvtrksopu:520: atra dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇaḥ śaśaśirasaḥ sādhyadharmiṇaś ca pradeśaviśeṣasyopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptapratiṣedhyānupalambhahetukṛtaṃ sādṛśyam abhidheyam //
XXvtrksopu:522: yat sat tat sarvam anityaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ saṃś ca śabdaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:529: sā ca bhāvasyātmabhūtaiva kevalaṃ kalpanayā vyatirekiṇīva pradarśyate /
XXvtrksopu:530: yat kṛtakaṃ tad anityaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ kṛtakaś ca śabda iti vyatiriktaviśeṣaṇasya /
XXvtrksopu:531: apekṣitaparavyāpāro hi svabhāvaniṣpattau bhāvaḥ kṛtaka iti /
XXvtrksopu:533: atra hi dṛṣṭāntadharmibhiḥ sādhyadharmiṇāṃ hetukṛtaṃ sādṛśyam abhidheyam /
XXvtrksopu:540: yatra yatra dhūmas tatra tatra vahnir yathā mahānase /
XXvtrksopu:542: atra dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇo mahānasasya sādhyadharmiṇaś ca pradeśaviśeṣasya dhūmahetukṛtaṃ sādṛśyam abhidheyam /
XXvtrksopu:543: ihāpi tribhir anupalambhair dvābhyāṃ pratyakṣābhyāṃ siddhe kāryakāraṇabhave kāraṇe sādhye kāryahetur vaktavyaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:548: atra hi dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇo nilaviśeṣasya sādhyadharmiṇaś ca pradeśasyopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaniṣedhyānupalambhākhyahetukṛtaṃ vaisādṛśyam abhidheyam /
XXvtrksopu:549: 7. svabhāvahetor vaidharmyavantaḥ prayogāḥ asaty anityatve nāsti kvacit sattvaṃ yathā gaganamaline /
XXvtrksopu:551: asaty anityatve na kvacid utpattimattvaṃ yathākāśe /
XXvtrksopu:553: asaty anityatve na kvacit kṛtakatvaṃ yathā kurmaromni /
XXvtrksopu:555: atra dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇā sādhyadharmiṇo hetukṛtaṃ vaisadṛśyam abhidheyam //
XXvtrksopu:557: asaty agnau na bhavaty eva dhūmo yathā mahāhrade /
XXvtrksopu:559: (Ts 299) atra dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇā sādhyadharmiṇo hetukṛtaṃ vaisadṛśyam abhidheyam //
XXvtrksopu:560: 9. trirūpaliṅgākhyānaṃ parārtham anumānam ity arthān na pakṣādivacanam anumānam uktaṃ bhavati /
XXvtrksopu:561: tatra pratijñā tāvan na sākṣāt sādhanam /
XXvtrksopu:563: artha eva hy arthaṃ gamayati pratibandhān /
XXvtrksopu:567: sādhyasādhanadharmaviśeṣopadarśanārtham anavayavabhūtāpi pratijñā dṛṣṭāntavat prayujyata iti cet /
XXvtrksopu:569: evaṃ hy anujñādivākyam api prayoktavyaṃ syāt /
XXvtrksopu:570: na hi tair vinā eva sādhanasya pravṛttir saṃbhavati /
XXvtrksopu:573: tathā hi yat kṛtakaṃ tat sarvam anityaṃ kṛtakaś ca śabda ity etāvanmātre prayukte 'nityaḥ śabda iti pratītir bhavaty evāntareṇa pratijñāvacanam /
XXvtrksopu:577: asati hi pratijñānirdeśe pakṣāpekṣānibandhanaṃ trairūpyaṃ nāstīti /
XXvtrksopu:579: tathā hi pratijñāvacanam antareṇāpi sarvaṃ saṃpadyata eva /
XXvtrksopu:580: upanayanasya punar arthaḥ pakṣadharmavacanenaiva nirdiṣṭa iti na tatpūrvake tasya kaścid upayogaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:581: vyāptipūrvake vacane pakṣadharmavacanād eva tadarthasiddheḥ kim anenopanayena /
XXvtrksopu:591: asiddhau saṃdehe vā pratipādyasya pratipādakasya hetvābhāsaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:592: 11. tatraikasya rūpasya dharmisaṃbandhasyāsiddhau saṃdehe cāsiddho hetvābhāsaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:594: cetanās tarava iti sādhye sarvatvagapaharaṇe maraṇaṃ prativādyasiddham /
XXvtrksopu:596: acetanāḥ sukhādaya iti sādhya utpattimattvam anityatvaṃ vā sāṃkhyasya svayaṃvādino 'siddham /
XXvtrksopu:597: atra cotpattimattvam anityatvaṃ vā paryāyeṇa hetur na yugapat tathā hi parārtho hetūpanyāsaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:598: parasya cāsata utpāda utpattimattvaṃ sataś ca niranvayo vināśo 'nityatvaṃ siddham iti /
XXvtrksopu:600: yathā bāspādibhāvena saṃdigdho bhūtasaṃghāto 'gnisiddhau bhūtānāṃ pṛthivyādīnāṃ saṃghātaḥ samūho 'gnisiddhyartham upādīyamāno 'siddhaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:601: yathā ceha nikūñjemayūraḥ kekāyitād iti tadāpātadeśavibhrame /
XXvtrksopu:602: āpātanam āpātas tasya kekāyitasyāpāta utpādas tasya deśas tasya vibhramo bhrāntiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:603: atha vā āpataty āgacchaty asmād ity āpātaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:606: yat punar ucyate 'nyair āpāta āgamanam iti tad ayuktam /
XXvtrksopu:614: tasmād yady ayam ātmā sarvagato na bhavet /
XXvtrksopu:615: kathaṃ dakṣiṇāpatha upalabdhāḥ sukhādayo madhyadeśa upalabhyante /
XXvtrksopu:616: ākāśavad iti dṛṣṭānte ākāśasya guṇaḥ śabdaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:617: sa ca yathā vikāriṇi puruṣa upalabhyate tathānyatrāpīti /
XXvtrksopu:618: syād eṣa hetur yadi bauddhasya sarvatropalabhyamānaguṇatvam ātmanaḥ siddhaṃ syāt /
XXvtrksopu:622: yathā śabdasya nityatvādike dharme sādhye prameyatvādiko dharmaḥ sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ sarvatraikadeśe ca vartamānaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:627: nityaḥ śabdaḥ prameyatvād ity atra nityatve sādhye prameyatvaṃ sapakṣavipakṣayor vartate /
XXvtrksopu:628: ekadeśe ca vartamāna ity atrāpi sapakṣavipakṣayor iti saṃbandhanīyaṃ /
XXvtrksopu:634: yo vā sapakṣavipakṣayor ekadeśavṛttiḥ sarvo 'sāv anaikāntiko hetvābhāsa iti /
XXvtrksopu:635: tatra prayatnānantariyakaḥ śabdo 'nityatvād ghaṭavad ity ayaṃ vipakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:636: vidyuti vartamānatvād ākāśādāv avartamānatvāt sapakṣavyāpī tu bhavaty eva /
XXvtrksopu:645: asparśatvaṃ hi vipakṣaikadeśe buddhyādau sapakṣaikadeśe cākāśādau vartata ity ubhayapakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:648: yathā sarvajñaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ puruṣo rāgādimān veti sādhye vaktṛtvādiko dharmaḥ saṃdigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:649: sarvatraikadeśe vā sarvajño vaktā nopalabhyata iti /
XXvtrksopu:654: sapakṣe sattvasyāsapakṣe cāsattvasya yathā kṛtakatvaṃ prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ ca nityatve sādhye viruddhahetvābhāsaḥ //
XXvtrksopu:656: anayoḥ (Ts 303) sapakṣe 'sattvam asapakṣe ca sattvam iti viparyayasiddhiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:658: dvayo rūpayor ekasyāsiddhāv aparasya ca saṃdehe 'naikāntikaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:663: yathā vītarāgaḥ sarvajño vā vaktṛtvād iti /
XXvtrksopu:665: sarvajñavītarāgayor viprakarṣād vacanādes tatra sattvam asattvaṃ vā saṃdigdham /
XXvtrksopu:668: na hi sātmakānatmakābhyām anyo rāśir asti yatra praṇādir vartate /
XXvtrksopu:672: 15. evam eteṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ rūpāṇāṃ ekaikasya dvayor dvayor vā rūpayor asiddhau saṃdehe ca yathāyogam asiddhaviruddhānaikāntikās trayo hetvābhāsāḥ /
XXvtrksopu:677: tathā dvayor dvayor vā rūpayor asiddhau saṃdehe ca yathāyogam iti yathāsaṃbhavam /
XXvtrksopu:679: tathā sapakṣe sattvasyāsiddhau saṃdehe cānaikāntika uktaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:680: evam ekaikasya rūpasyāsiddhau saṃdehe cāsiddho 'naikāntikaś ca hetvābhāsa (Ts 304) uktaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:681: tathā dvayor dvayo rūpayor viparyayasiddhau viruddho hetvābhāsa uktaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:682: asapakṣe sattvasya ca saṃdehe vā 'naikāntika uktaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:683: tathā sapakṣāsapakṣayor api hetoḥ sadasattvasaṃdehe 'naikāntika eva /
XXvtrksopu:684: evaṃ dvayor dvayor asiddhau saṃdehe ca viruddho 'naikāntikaś ca hetvābhāsa iti /
XXvtrksopu:685: 16. nanu katham uktaṃ trayo hetvābhāsā iti /
XXvtrksopu:686: yāvatā vaiphalyam api hetoḥ pṛthagdūṣaṇam asti / tad uktam /
XXvtrksopu:687: sādhanaṃ yad vivādena nyastaṃ tac cen na sādhyate /
XXvtrksopu:688: kiṃ sādhyam anyathāniṣṭaṃ bhaved vaiphalyam eva vā // iti
XXvtrksopu:689: atra kecid āhuḥ satyam asty eva vaiphalyaṃ hetoḥ pṛthagdūṣaṇaṃ /
XXvtrksopu:690: yat punar asiddhaviruddhānaikāntikakathanaṃ viniścayādau tad asāmarthyaprabhedena /
XXvtrksopu:695: syād etad yadi vaiyarthyaṃ nāma hetor dūṣaṇaṃ syāt kiṃ tu pramāṇasya /
XXvtrksopu:697: adhigatam api gamayatā pramāṇena piṣṭaṃ piṣṭaṃ syād iti /
XXvtrksopu:700: karmaṇy aindriyam anyad vā sādhanaṃ kim itīṣyata iti
XXvtrksopu:701: tataś ca katham idaṃ vaiyarthyaṃ hetor dūṣaṇam /
XXvtrksopu:702: (Ts 305) athaivam ucyate pramāṇājanakatvād dhetur api vyartha ucyata iti /
XXvtrksopu:703: evaṃ hi vāstavam idaṃ hetor na dūṣaṇaṃ syāt /
XXvtrksopu:706: yadi vaiyarthyaṃ hetor dūṣanaṃ bhinnaṃ syāt /
XXvtrksopu:710: tathā vaiyarthyapratipakṣeṇāpy anyad rūpam uktaṃ syāt /
XXvtrksopu:712: yadi tarhīdaṃ vaiyarthyaṃ na pṛthagdūṣaṇaṃ kathaṃ tarhy anena vādī nigṛhyate //
XXvtrksopu:719: nedaṃ hetor dūṣaṇaṃ kiṃ tu parārthānumāne vaktur api guṇadoṣāś cintyante iti viphalābhidhāyī apratibhayaiva nigṛhyata iti /
XXvtrksopu:720: tathā hi prakṛtam eva sādhyaṃ nāprakṛtam iti sādhyatāyāḥ prakṛter niyāmaka eṣa panthā /
XXvtrksopu:722: doṣāḥ punar nyūnatvam asiddhir vādinā sādhayitum iṣṭasyārthasya viparyayasādhanam aṣṭādaśa dṛṣṭāntadoṣāś ceti /
XXvtrksopu:723: atra ca yac codyaṃ parihāraśca tad granthavistarabhayān na likhitam iti /
XXvtrksopu:725: yadi vaiyarthyaṃ hetor dūṣaṇaṃ tadāsiddha evāntarbhavati /
XXvtrksopu:727: 18. triIakṣaṇo hetur uktas tāvatārthapratītir iti na pṛthag dṛṣṭānto nāma sādhanāvayavaḥ kaścit /
XXvtrksopu:728: tena nāsya lakṣaṇaṃ pṛthag ucyate gatārthatvāt /
XXvtrksopu:729: hetoḥ sapakṣa eva sattvam asapakṣāc ca sarvato vyāvṛttī rūpam uktam abhedena i punar aviśeṣeṇa kāryasvabhāvayor janmatanmātrānubandhau darśanīyāv uktau /
XXvtrksopu:731: hetoḥ sapakṣa eva sattvam iti sādhyenānugatam idam ekaṃ rūpam asapakṣāc ca sarvato vyāvṛttir iti sādhyanivṛttyā nivṛttir asya dvitīyaṃ rūpam uktam /
XXvtrksopu:735: tac ca darśayatā dhūmas tatrāgnir iti asaty agnau na kvacid dhumo yathā mahānasetarayoḥ /
XXvtrksopu:736: yatra kṛtakatvaṃ tatrānityatvam anityatvābhāve kṛtakatvāsaṃbhavo yathā ghaṭākāśayor iti darśanīyam /
XXvtrksopu:737: na hy anyathā sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ sadasattve yathoktaprakāre śakye darśayituṃ /
XXvtrksopu:739: tasyāgnyādeḥ kāryaṃ tatkāryaṃ tasya bhāvas tatkāryatā /
XXvtrksopu:740: na hy anyathā śakyo darśayitum iti liṅgavacanavipariṇāmena sambandhanīyam //
XXvtrksopu:741: 19. asmiṃś cārthe darśite darśita eva dṛṣṭānto bhavati /
XXvtrksopu:744: etenaiveti hetulakṣaṇābhidhānenaiva dṛṣṭāntasyāpi sāmarthyād gatārthatvena dṛṣṭāntadoṣā (Ts 307)
XXvtrksopu:746: yena hetoḥ sāmānyaviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ yathoktaṃ pradarśyate sa saṃyagdṛṣṭāntaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:747: yena punas tasya lakṣaṇadvayaṃ na pradarśyate so dṛṣṭāntābhāsa ity uktaṃ bhavati /
XXvtrksopu:751: atra hi karmaṇi nityatvaṃ sādhyadharmo nāsti /
XXvtrksopu:764: rathyāpuruṣe vacanaṃ pratyakṣeṇaiva niścitam iti sādhanadharmas tatra siddhaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:768: rathyāpuruṣe maraṇadharmatvaṃ sādhyadharma utpattimattvādinā liṅgena niścitaṃ rāgādimattvaṃ tv aniścitam iti saṃdigdhasādhanadharmā /
XXvtrksopu:772: yatra sādhyena hetor vyāptir nāsti so 'nanvayaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:775: na hi rāgādīnāṃ vacanasya tādātmyalakṣaṇas tadutpattilakṣano vā pratibandho 'sti yenātrānvayaḥ (Ts 308) syāt /
XXvtrksopu:779: na tu vacanenākhyāta ity avidyamāna ivāsau /
XXvtrksopu:783: atra hi yat kṛtakaṃ tad anityam ity anvaye vaktavye yad anityaṃ tat kṛtakam iti viparītam anvayaṃ karoti sarva ete dṛṣṭāntadoṣāḥ sādharmyeṇa //
XXvtrksopu:803: saṃdigdhasādhanvyatirekaḥ yathā na trayīvidā brāhmaṇena grāhyavacanaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ puruṣo rāgādimattvāt /
XXvtrksopu:805: ye grāhyavacanā na te rāgādimantas tad yathā gautamādayo dharmaśāstrāṇāṃ praṇetāraḥ /
XXvtrksopu:818: yatra vītarāgatvaṃ nāsti na sa vaktā yathopalakhaṇḍa iti /
XXvtrksopu:820: tathāpi sarvo vītarāgo na vakteti vyāptyā vyatirekāsiddher avyatirekaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:822: yathānityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād ākāśavad iti vaidharmyeṇa /
XXvtrksopu:823: yo hy anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād iti prayoge vaidharmyeṇākāśavad iti brūyāt tena vidyamāno 'pi vyatireko na pradarśitaḥ tathā /
XXvtrksopu:824: yadāśeṣapadārthopasaṃhāreṇānityatvābhāve kṛtakatvābhāvo yathākāśavad iti karoti tadā vyatireko darśito bhavati /
XXvtrksopu:828: atra hi yan nityaṃ tad akṛtakam iti vaktavye /
XXvtrksopu:829: yad akṛtakaṃ tan nityam iti vadati //
XXvtrksopu:830: 21. na hy ebhir dṛṣṭāntābhāsair hetoḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ sapakṣa eva sattvam asapakṣe cāsattvam eva niścayena śakyaṃ darśayituṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ vā /
XXvtrksopu:831: ebhiḥ sādhyavikalair dṛṣṭāntābhāsair hetoḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ niścayena na śakyaṃ darśayituṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ veti saṃbandhanīyaṃ tadarthāpattyaiṣāṃ nirāso veditavyaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:832: yasmād ebhir dṛṣṭāntābhāsair dvividham api lakṣaṇaṃ na śakyaṃ darśayitum /
XXvtrksopu:838: dṛṣṭāntadoṣāś ca gṛhyante ye pūrvaṃ nyūnatādayaḥ sādhanadoṣā uktās teṣām udbhāvanaṃ tena pareṣṭārthasiddhipratibandhāt /
XXvtrksopu:839: anena ca yad ahrīkeṇoktaṃ viparyayasādhanam eva dūṣaṇaṃ nānyad iti tad api parāstaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ /
XXvtrksopu:843: niścayābhāvo vā bhavati niścayaviparyaya ity asty eva viparyayasiddhiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:849: yat tarkasopānam idaṃ vidhāya puṇyaṃ mayāptaṃ śaradinduśubhram /
XXvtrksopu:850: tenottamāṃ bodhim ahaṃ labheya lokaś ca niryātu bhavād aśeṣaḥ //
